reviewText:
Great DVD.  I show it to my students in the Florida Jails.

Bill Dooley
Los Angeles
Santa Fe
Naples, Fl

This is a very entertaining one man show of the life and times  of Einstein.
Polinsky's portrayal of Einstein is so intimate,that you feel like you're in his living room listening to his stories.
The hour goes by very fast.
It is available  through Kultur for 20 bucks. Enjoy.
